Articles.Content: Title says it all; How do I get the guns on my plane to shoot?

You need the weapon manager part, then you open it with the toolbar (top-right, to the left of Contracts/Alerts/). It should say BD there. Then open it, left-click on the name of the gun you want to shoot, and arm it in the first(left-most) tab. Then with a simple click of the left-mouse button, your guns will start destroying anything you want.
Make a good plane. Attach a weapon manager on it. Attach missiles, bombs, guns, and ammo on the plane. Have fun blowing up the KSC!
